column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Zuko says : " So far , this intermission is the best part of the play . "
#Text=Sokka says : " Apparently , the playwright thinks I 'm an idiot who tells bad jokes about meat all the time ! "
#Text=Suki says : " Yeah , you tell bad jokes about plenty of other topics . "
#Text=Sokka says : " I know ! "
#Text=Aang says : " At least the Sokka actor kind of looks like you .
#Text=" Aang says : " Argh !
#Text=" Katara says : " Relax , Aang .
#Text=They 're not accurate portrayals .
#Text=It 's not like I 'm a preachy crybaby who ca n't resist giving overemotional speeches about hope all the time .
#Text=What ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah , that 's not you at all .
#Text=" Toph says : " Listen friends , it 's obvious that the playwright did his research .
#Text=I know it must hurt , but what you 're seeing up there on that stage is the truth .
#Text=" Actress Katara says : " Well , here we are in the Earth Kingdom !
#Text=" Actress Aang says : " I 'd better have a look around to see if I can find an earthbending teacher !
#Text=" Toph says : " This is it , this must be where I come in !
#Text=" Actress Aang says : " I flew all over town , but I could n't find a single earthbending master !
#Text=" Toph says : " Here it comes ... " Actor Toph says : " You ca n't find an earthbending master in the sky , you have to look underground !
#Text=" Actress Aang says : " Who are you ?
#Text=" Actor Toph says : " My name 's Toph , because it sounds like tough , and that 's just what I am !
#Text=" Toph says : " Wait a minute , I sound like a guy .
#Text=A really buff guy .
#Text=" Katara says : " Well Toph , what you hear up there is the truth .
#Text=It hurts , does n't it ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Are you kidding me ?
#Text=I would n't have cast it any other way !
#Text=At least it 's not a flying bald lady !
#Text=" Actress Aang says : " So , you 're blind ?
#Text=" Actor Toph says : " I can see you doing that .
#Text=I see everything that you see , except I do n't " see " like you do .
#Text=I release a sonic wave from my mouth .
#Text=There .
#Text=I got a pretty good look at you .
#Text="
